name: A. Flores - 1975 Connecticut Valley Reserve Roja - Churchill
brand: A. Flores, 1975 Connecticut Valley Reserve Roja
additionalNotes: Originally released in 2015, the Connecticut Valley Reserve lines were sold under PDR’s Flores y Rodriguez series but are now part of the A. Flores brand, and will be produced in limited runs to be released only twice per year. The A. Flores Connecticut Valley Reserve comes in two versions: Azul and Roja. Azul (“blue” in Spanish) has a lighter Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper that Flores categorizes as “claro,” while the Roja line (“red” in Spanish) has a darker Connecticut broadleaf wrapper classified as “maduro.” Both lines are made with Nicaraguan binders and a filler blend of Nicaraguan and Dominican tobacco.
